title: Cannot Submit a Support ticket
body: Every time I try to submit a support ticket I am given this message. "Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted"

replies.body:
Eeeeehhhhh that's pretty weird o_o.....

That browser might be trying to pull old cookie data and load a ticket you had previously viewed, so we could try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or possibly try using a different browser or a private window.

In the long run, if none of that is working you can still shoot us an email at support@riotgames.com to submit a ticket as well.
Tried a different browser but thanks for the info, I'll send an email.
